data.title: Quality yarns and friendly
data.text: On trips I enjoy bringing a bit of yarn or some knitting book or something to do with knitting or weaving home with me. This is the place you never want to leave. Gail, the owner, has cookies and coffee, her puppy, and the coziest store I have ever been in. They often have knitting and weaving clubs or classes. The yarns are stunning. Most definitely a great stop if you are in town.
